verses.verse: But a certain <S%G5100><s%> man <S%G435><s%> named <S%G3686><s%> Ananias, <S%G367><s%> with Sapphira <S%G4551><s%> his wife, <S%G1135><s%> sold <S%G4453><s%> a possession, <S%G2933><s%>

And kept <S%G3557><s%> back <S%G3557><s%> part of the price, <S%G5092><s%> his wife <S%G1135><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> being privy <S%G4894><s%> to it, and brought <S%G5342><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> part, <S%G3313><s%> and laid <S%G5087><s%> it at <S%G3844><s%> the apostles' <S%G652><s%> feet. <S%G4228><s%>

But Peter <S%G4074><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Ananias, <S%G367><s%> why <S%G1302><s%> has Satan <S%G4567><s%> filled <S%G4137><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> to lie <S%G5574><s%> to the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost, <S%G4151><s%> and to keep <S%G3557><s%> back <S%G3557><s%> part of the price <S%G5092><s%> of the land? <S%G5564><s%>

Whiles it remained, <S%G3306><s%> was it not your <S%G4671><s%> own? and after it was sold, <S%G4097><s%> was it not in your <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4674><s%> own power? <S%G1849><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> have you conceived <S%G5087><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> thing <S%G4229><s%> in your <S%G4675><s%> heart? <S%G2588><s%> you have not lied <S%G5574><s%> to men, <S%G444><s%> but to God. <S%G2316><s%>

And Ananias <S%G367><s%> hearing <S%G191><s%> these <S%G5128><s%> words <S%G3056><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> down, and gave up the ghost: <S%G1634><s%> and great <S%G3173><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> them that heard <S%G191><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things.
And the young <S%G3501><s%> men arose, <S%G450><s%> wound <S%G4958><s%> him up, and carried <S%G1627><s%> him out, and buried <S%G2290><s%> him.

And it was about <S%G5613><s%> the space <S%G1292><s%> of three <S%G5140><s%> hours <S%G5610><s%> after, when his wife, <S%G1135><s%> not knowing <S%G1492><s%> what <S%G3588><s%> was done, <S%G1096><s%> came <S%G1525><s%> in.

And Peter <S%G4074><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> to her, Tell <S%G2036><s%> me whether <S%G1487><s%> you sold <S%G591><s%> the land <S%G5564><s%> for so <S%G5118><s%> much? <S%G5118><s%> And she said, <S%G2036><s%> Yes, <S%G3483><s%> for so <S%G5118><s%> much. <S%G5118><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to her, How <S%G5101><s%> is it that you have agreed <S%G4856><s%> together <S%G4856><s%> to tempt <S%G3985><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of the Lord? <S%G2962><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> the feet <S%G4228><s%> of them which have buried <S%G2290><s%> your husband <S%G435><s%> are at <S%G1909><s%> the door, <S%G2374><s%> and shall carry <S%G1627><s%> you out.

Then <S%G1161><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> she down straightway <S%G3916><s%> at <S%G3844><s%> his feet, <S%G4228><s%> and yielded <S%G1634><s%> up the ghost: <S%G1634><s%> and the young <S%G3495><s%> men <S%G3495><s%> came <S%G1525><s%> in, and found <S%G2147><s%> her dead, <S%G3498><s%> and, carrying <S%G1627><s%> her forth, <S%G1627><s%> buried <S%G2290><s%> her by her husband. <S%G435><s%>
And great <S%G3173><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> on all <S%G3650><s%> the church, <S%G1577><s%> and on as many as heard <S%G191><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things.

And by the hands <S%G5495><s%> of the apostles <S%G652><s%> were many <S%G4183><s%> signs <S%G4592><s%> and wonders <S%G5059><s%> worked <S%G1096><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the people; <S%G2992><s%> (and they were all <S%G537><s%> with one <S%G3661><s%> accord <S%G3661><s%> in Solomon's <S%G4672><s%> porch. <S%G4745><s%>
And of the rest <S%G3062><s%> dared <S%G5111><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> join <S%G2853><s%> himself to them: but the people <S%G2992><s%> magnified <S%G3170><s%> them.
And believers <S%G4100><s%> were the more <S%G3123><s%> added <S%G4369><s%> to the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> multitudes <S%G4128><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> of men <S%G435><s%> and women. <S%G1135><s%>)

So <S%G5620><s%> that they brought <S%G1627><s%> forth <S%G1627><s%> the sick <S%G772><s%> into <S%G2596><s%> the streets, <S%G4113><s%> and laid <S%G5087><s%> them on <S%G1909><s%> beds <S%G2825><s%> and couches, <S%G2895><s%> that at <S%G2579><s%> the least <S%G2579><s%> the shadow <S%G4639><s%> of Peter <S%G4074><s%> passing <S%G2064><s%> by might overshadow <S%G1982><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> of them.

There came <S%G4905><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> a multitude <S%G4128><s%> out of the cities <S%G4172><s%> round <S%G4038><s%> about <S%G4038><s%> to Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> bringing <S%G5342><s%> sick <S%G772><s%> folks, and them which were vexed <S%G3791><s%> with unclean <S%G169><s%> spirits: <S%G4151><s%> and they were healed <S%G2323><s%> every <S%G537><s%> one.

Then <S%G1161><s%> the high <S%G749><s%> priest <S%G749><s%> rose <S%G450><s%> up, and all <S%G3956><s%> they that were with him, (which <S%G3588><s%> is the sect <S%G139><s%> of the Sadducees, <S%G4523><s%>) and were filled <S%G4137><s%> with indignation, <S%G2205><s%>
And laid <S%G1911><s%> their hands <S%G5495><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the apostles, <S%G652><s%> and put <S%G5087><s%> them in the common <S%G1219><s%> prison. <S%G5084><s%>

But the angel <S%G32><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> by night <S%G3571><s%> opened <S%G455><s%> the prison <S%G5438><s%> doors, <S%G2374><s%> and brought <S%G1806><s%> them forth, <S%G1806><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%>

Go, <S%G4198><s%> stand <S%G2476><s%> and speak <S%G2980><s%> in the temple <S%G2411><s%> to the people <S%G2992><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the words <S%G4487><s%> of this <S%G5026><s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>

And when they heard <S%G191><s%> that, they entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the temple <S%G2411><s%> early <S%G3722><s%> in the morning, and taught. <S%G1321><s%> But the high <S%G749><s%> priest <S%G749><s%> came, <S%G3854><s%> and they that were with him, and called <S%G4779><s%> the council <S%G4892><s%> together, <S%G4779><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> the senate <S%G1087><s%> of the children <S%G5207><s%> of Israel, <S%G2474><s%> and sent <S%G649><s%> to the prison <S%G1201><s%> to have them brought. <S%G71><s%>
But when the officers <S%G5257><s%> came, <S%G3854><s%> and found <S%G2147><s%> them not in the prison, <S%G5438><s%> they returned <S%G390><s%>and told, <S%G518><s%>

Saying, <S%G3004><s%> The prison <S%G1201><s%> truly <S%G3303><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> we shut <S%G2808><s%> with all <S%G3956><s%> safety, <S%G803><s%> and the keepers <S%G5441><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> without <S%G1854><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> the doors: <S%G2374><s%> but when we had opened, <S%G455><s%> we found <S%G2147><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> within. <S%G2080><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> the high <S%G2409><s%> priest <S%G749><s%> and the captain <S%G4755><s%> of the temple <S%G2411><s%> and the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> these <S%G5128><s%> things, <S%G3056><s%> they doubted <S%G1280><s%> of them whereunto <S%G5101><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> would grow. <S%G1096><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> came <S%G3854><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> and told <S%G518><s%> them, saying, <S%G3004><s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> the men <S%G435><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> you put <S%G5087><s%> in prison <S%G5438><s%> are standing <S%G2476><s%> in the temple, <S%G2411><s%> and teaching <S%G1321><s%> the people. <S%G2992><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> went <S%G565><s%> the captain <S%G4755><s%> with the officers, <S%G5257><s%> and brought <S%G71><s%> them without <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3326><s%> violence: <S%G970><s%> for they feared <S%G5399><s%> the people, <S%G2992><s%> lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> they should have been stoned. <S%G3034><s%>
And when they had brought <S%G71><s%> them, they set <S%G2476><s%> them before <S%G1722><s%> the council: <S%G4892><s%> and the high <S%G749><s%> priest <S%G749><s%> asked <S%G1905><s%> them,

Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Did not we straightly command <S%G3853><s%> you that you should not teach <S%G1321><s%> in this <S%G5129><s%> name? <S%G3686><s%> and, behold, <S%G2400><s%> you have filled <S%G4137><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> with your <S%G5216><s%> doctrine, <S%G1322><s%> and intend <S%G1014><s%> to bring <S%G1863><s%> this <S%G5127><s%> man's <S%G444><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> on us.

Then <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> and the other apostles <S%G652><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> We ought <S%G1163><s%> to obey <S%G3980><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> men. <S%G444><s%>

The God <S%G2316><s%> of our fathers <S%G3962><s%> raised <S%G1453><s%> up Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> you slew <S%G1315><s%> and hanged <S%G2910><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> a tree. <S%G3586><s%>

Him has God <S%G2316><s%> exalted <S%G5312><s%> with his right <S%G1188><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%> to be a Prince <S%G747><s%> and a Savior, <S%G4990><s%> for to give <S%G1325><s%> repentance <S%G3341><s%> to Israel, <S%G2474><s%> and forgiveness <S%G859><s%> of sins. <S%G266><s%>

And we are his witnesses <S%G3144><s%> of these <S%G5130><s%> things; <S%G4487><s%> and so is also <S%G2532><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost, <S%G4151><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> has given <S%G1325><s%> to them that obey <S%G3980><s%> him.
When they heard <S%G191><s%> that, they were cut <S%G1282><s%> to the heart, <S%G2588><s%> and took <S%G1011><s%> counsel <S%G1011><s%> to slay <S%G337><s%> them.

Then <S%G1161><s%> stood <S%G450><s%> there up one <S%G5100><s%> in the council, <S%G4892><s%> a Pharisee, <S%G5330><s%> named <S%G3686><s%> Gamaliel, <S%G1059><s%> a doctor <S%G3547><s%> of the law, <S%G3547><s%> had in reputation <S%G5093><s%> among all <S%G3956><s%> the people, <S%G2992><s%> and commanded <S%G2753><s%> to put <S%G4160><s%> the apostles <S%G652><s%> forth <S%G1854><s%> a little <S%G1024><s%> space; <S%G1024><s%>

And said <S%G2036><s%> to them, You men <S%G435><s%> of Israel, <S%G2475><s%> take heed <S%G4337><s%> to yourselves <S%G1438><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> you intend <S%G3195><s%> to do <S%G4238><s%> as touching <S%G1909><s%> these <S%G5125><s%> men. <S%G444><s%>

For before <S%G4253><s%> these <S%G5130><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> rose <S%G450><s%> up Theudas, <S%G2333><s%> boasting <S%G3004><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> to be somebody; <S%G5100><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> a number <S%G706><s%> of men, <S%G435><s%> about <S%G5616><s%> four <S%G5071><s%> hundred, <S%G5071><s%> joined <S%G4347><s%> themselves: who <S%G3739><s%> was slain; <S%G337><s%> and all, <S%G3956><s%> as many <S%G3745><s%> as obeyed <S%G3982><s%> him, were scattered, <S%G1262><s%> and brought <S%G1096><s%> to nothing. <S%G3762><s%>

After <S%G3326><s%> this <S%G5126><s%> man rose <S%G450><s%> up Judas <S%G2455><s%> of Galilee <S%G1056><s%> in the days <S%G2250><s%> of the taxing, <S%G583><s%> and drew <S%G868><s%> away <S%G868><s%> much <S%G2425><s%> people <S%G2992><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> him: he also <S%G2548><s%> perished; <S%G622><s%> and all, <S%G3956><s%> even as many <S%G3745><s%> as obeyed <S%G3982><s%> him, were dispersed. <S%G1287><s%>

And now <S%G3568><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, Refrain <S%G868><s%> from these <S%G5130><s%> men, <S%G444><s%> and let <S%G1439><s%> them alone: <S%G1439><s%> for if <S%G1437><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> counsel <S%G1012><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> work <S%G2041><s%> be of men, <S%G444><s%> it will come <S%G2647><s%> to nothing: <S%G2647><s%>

But if <S%G1487><s%> it be of God, <S%G2316><s%> you cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> overthrow <S%G2647><s%> it; lest <S%G3379><s%> haply <S%G3379><s%> you be found <S%G2147><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> to fight <S%G2314><s%> against God. <S%G2314><s%>

And to him they agreed: <S%G3982><s%> and when they had called <S%G4341><s%> the apostles, <S%G652><s%> and beaten <S%G1194><s%> them, they commanded <S%G3853><s%> that they should not speak <S%G2980><s%> in the name <S%G3686><s%> of Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and let <S%G630><s%> them go. <S%G630><s%>

And they departed <S%G4198><s%> from the presence <S%G4383><s%> of the council, <S%G4892><s%> rejoicing <S%G5463><s%> that they were counted <S%G2661><s%> worthy <S%G2661><s%> to suffer <S%G818><s%> shame <S%G818><s%> for his name. <S%G3686><s%>

And daily <S%G3956><s%> <S%G2250><s%> in the temple, <S%G2411><s%> and in every <S%G2596><s%> house, <S%G3624><s%> they ceased <S%G3973><s%> not to teach <S%G1321><s%> and preach <S%G2097><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
